screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() lenlist = len(self.list)*25 if (lenlist >125): lenlist = 125
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50,textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = lenlist+10 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 >wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex,lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (25,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0,0), size = (40,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (45,0),size = (65,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 2),# number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115,0),size = (130,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250,0),size = (300,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630,4),size = (20,25),font = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT,text = 5),# selection, ],True,"showNever"), "notselected": (25,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0,0), size = (40,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (45,0),size = (65,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 2),# number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115,0),size = (130,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250,0),size = (300,25),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630,4),size = (20,25),font = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT,text = 5),# selection, ],False,"showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20),gFont("Regular",16)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,8),size = (680,40),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50,43),size = (640,60),font = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP,text = 2),# index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("SetrixHD",26),gFont("Regular",20)], "itemHeight": 110 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10,6),size = (54,54),png = 2),# index 3 is the interface pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100,6),size = (690,54),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER|RT_WRAP,text = 1),# index 1 is the interfacename ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",24),gFont("Regular",18)], "itemHeight": 65 }
